name: LASTWANG
description:
A VERY SHORT GAME.

You are Michael Santos, a man living alone in the hills of Mindanao. You are awaken by a loud rustling from the woods. Rumors say that the last aswang is in that area.

Goodluck, Michael.

Aswang is a terrifying monster native from the philippines. In daytime, Aswang shapeshifts into a human form, blending in the crowd. When the moon peeks from the skies, the aswang will shapeshift into a terrifying blood-sucking monster.
